ShipGenelineDef.label: Astral Cniderian
ShipGenelineDef.description: A geneline heavily inspired by cniderians, a pyhulm encompasing jellyfish, corals, hydras, and sea anemones.

SetterGeneDef.label: small nematocyst
SetterGeneDef.description: An explosive cell capable of launching a barbed thread. Devastating in their own right, they can act as delivery mechanisms for all manner of acid and toxin.

SetterGeneDef.label: medium acid
SetterGeneDef.description: Specialized glands launch globules of acidic mucus.

SetterGeneDef.label: heavy spine
SetterGeneDef.description: Specialized barbs driven by biosplasma, capable of hunting tracking prey.

SetterGeneDef.label: grand nematocyst
SetterGeneDef.description: A supercluster of explosive cells capable of launching barbed threads.

SetterGeneDef.label: coral armor
SetterGeneDef.description: Layers of ablative coral that provides exceptional protection against acid, toxin, and blunt impact.
